org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf

接口 ConfigurationObserver

  • 所有已知子接口:
    LoadBalancer, PropagatingConfigurationObserver, Region, RSGroupableBalancer
    所有已知实现类:
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer.BaseLoadBalancer, CompactSplit, FavoredNodeLoadBalancer, HMaster, HMasterCommandLine.LocalHMaster, HMobStore, HRegion, HRegionServer, HStore, MasterRpcServices, NettyRpcServer, RpcServer, RSGroupBasedLoadBalancer, RSRpcServices, SimpleRpcScheduler, SimpleRpcServer

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface ConfigurationObserver
    Every class that wants to observe changes in Configuration properties, must implement interface (and also, register itself with the ConfigurationManager object.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onConfigurationChange(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      This method would be called by the ConfigurationManager object when the Configuration object is reloaded from disk.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onConfigurationChange

        void onConfigurationChange(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        This method would be called by the ConfigurationManager object when the Configuration object is reloaded from disk.
